campaign.story:
Space Face Poster
Space Face: Mind of a Madman
Hello, my name is Han and I am directing Space Face, a feature-length documentary that explores existential questions through the life and career of my father, comic book artist Michael Allred. The film will feature interviews from some of the industry's greatest, including Kevin Smith, Brian Michael Bendis, Matt Fraction, Craig Thompson, Joëlle Jones, and many more.  
Mike Allred has continuously honed his craft while living out his childhood dream of creating comics. He is best known for his original works: Madman, Red Rocket 7, The Atomics, X-Ray Robot, his co-creations: iZombie plus the live-action CW adaptation streaming on Netflix, X-Statix, the brand new graphic biography, Bowie: Stardust, Rayguns, & Moonage Daydreams, and other projects: Silver Surfer, and Batman 66.  As bright as his life may appear, he has periodically endured extreme episodes of existential anxiety and psychological suffering. The first episode occurred at the age of 5. He has continued to experience them, with varying intensity, roughly every five years since then.
Mike Allred's Red Rocket 7
The episodes are reminiscent of an out-of-body psychedelic trip, brought on solely by existential questions of infinity, space, and meaning. These episodes have deeply impacted his psyche and, consequently, the work he has put out into the world—most notably his creation Madman. 
Mike Allred's Madman
I have discussed these episodes and the questions that trigger them at length with my dad. I've also collected responses from dozens of interviews with fellow artists, writers, editors, musicians, directors and more. The responses have been thought-provoking.
I am making this documentary both out of love for my dad and a desire to dig further into the questions that, at times, have driven him to become... a literal Madman. 
Behind the scenes with Mike Allred.
Plan of Action
I started research for the film nearly a year ago, acquired the necessary equipment and filmed my first interview last May. Since then, I have shot dozens of interviews with Mike's colleagues, collaborators and friends, mostly in the Portland and Eugene area. I am currently working on the rough edit and composing music for the film.
My intention for this campaign is to raise the necessary funds to travel outside the Pacific Northwest to shoot the remaining interviews and hire an attorney. If enough extra cash is raised above the initial goal, I would love to pay for color correction and professional sound to ensure the film looks and sounds as phenomenal as possible.
I intend to complete all of the interviews by the end of the summer 2020 and the final cut of the film by the end of 2021. I will update supporters on a regular basis throughout the process. 
Who's Involved?
I have help from people with years of industry experience to guide me as well as the resources at NW Film Center.
I've already conducted interviews with some amazing talent (listed below) and there are many more interviews on the horizon.
Mike Allred, the subject of the film, is an Eisner- and Harvey-Award-winning comic book artist and writer, best known for his creator-owned series Madman, The Atomics, and Red Rocket 7, as well as his work on iZOMBIE, Silver Surfer, X-Force / X-Statix, Bug!, FF, Batman '66, Fables, Spider-Man, Sandman, and the recently-released graphic biography Bowie: Stardust, Rayguns, & Moonage Daydreams.
Laura Allred is an Eisner-Award-winning comic book colorist best known for her work with her husband on titles like Madman, as well as her work with Joëlle Jones on Catwoman. 
Gabriel Ba is a Eisner-Award-winning comic book artist best known for co-creating The Umbrella Academy, plus its live-action adaptation streaming on Netflix, Casanova, and Daytripper.
Interview with Brian Michael Bendis.
Brian Michael Bendis is an Eisner-Award-winning comic book artist and writer, best known as a co-creator of Miles Morales and Jessica Jones, as well as his work on Ultimate Spider-Man, Powers, New Avengers, Daredevil, Action Comics, and Superman.
Randy Bowen is an acclaimed sculptor of pop-culture characters, best known for his work with Dark Horse, Marvel, and DC Comics.
Matt Brundage is a comic book artist best known for his work on Art Ops. He was also a long-time friend of Mike Allred's and the lead in Mike's 1996 indy film, Astroesque.
Bob Camp is an animator, writer, and cartoonist, best known for co-creating The Ren & Stimpy Show, as well as his work on SpongeBob SquarePants and ThunderCats. 
Kelly Sue DeConnick is a comic book writer and editor, best known for her work on Avengers Assemble, Captain Marvel, Pretty Deadly, and Bitch Planet. 
Nick Derington Madman Pin-up
Nick Derington is a comic book artist best known for his work on Batman Universe, Doom Patrol, and Mister Miracle.
Matt Fraction is an Eisner-Award-winning comic book writer best known for his work on Hawkeye, Sex Criminals, The Invincible Iron Man, Casanova, Uncanny X-Men, and FF.
Brandon Graham is a comic book artist and writer, best known for his work on King City, Multiple Warheads, Prophet, and Island, an anthology series by Image.
Joëlle Jones Madman Pin-up
Joëlle Jones is a comic book artist and writer, best known for her work on Lady Killer, Supergirl, Batman, and Catwoman.
Joe Keatinge is a comic book writer and editor, best known for co-creating the Image  comics Flavor, Shutter, Ringside, and Glory, as well as editing the PopGun anthology series.
D.J. Kirkbride is a comic book writer and editor, best known for his work on Errand Boys, Amelia Cole, and PopGun. 
Jim Mahfood Madman Pin-up
Jim Mahfood is a comic book artist and writer, best known for his work on Grrl Scouts, Stupid Comics, Marijuana Man, Clerks, Tank Girl as well as illustrating the Kickpuncher comic for the NBC series Community.
Fabio Moon is an Eisner Award winning comic book artist, best known for his work on Casanova, Daytripper, B.P.R.D., and How to Talk to Girls at Parties with author Neil Gaiman.
Joe Nozemack is co-founder of Oni Press and a film producer known for work on Scott Pilgrim vs. The World, and Atomic Blonde. 
Michael Avon Oeming Pin-up
Michael Avon Oeming is a Eisner-Award-winning comic book artist and writer, best known for his work on Powers, The Mice Templar, The Cross Bronx, and Dick Tracy.
Arnold and Jacob Pander: The Pander Brothers are comic book artist and filmmakers, best known for their work on Grendel, GirlFIEND, and Dissident X.
Michael Richardson is the founder of Dark Horse Comics, a writer, and Emmy-winning producer, best known for his work on The Mask, Hellboy, and The Legend of Tarzan.
iZombie
Chris Roberson is a science fiction author and comic book writer, best known for his work on iZOMBIE plus its live-action adaptation on Netflix, Cinderella, Hellboy and the B.P.R.D, and Witchfinder.
Ben Saunders is a University of Oregon Professor, known for his work as Director of Comic and Cartoon Studies.
Bob Schreck is co-founder of Oni Press, and a Harvey-Award-winning editor, best known for his work at DC Comics, Dark Horse Comics, and Comico, on projects like Sin City, The Big Guy and Rusty the Boy Robot, Dark Horse Presents, Batman, and Madman.
Diana Schutz is an Eisner- and Harvey-Award-winning editor, best known for her work at Dark Horse Comics and Comico, on project like Mage, Grendel, Batman/Grendel, American Splendor, Sin City, 300, and Madman. 
Interview with Kevin Smith
Kevin Smith is a filmmaker, actor, comedian and comic book writer, best known for his films Clerks, Mallrats, Chasing Amy, Dogma, Jay and Silent Bob Strike Back, and Jay and Silent Bob Reboot.
Courtney Taylor-Taylor is a singer-songwriter known as lead singer and guitarist of The Dandy Warhols.
Craig Thompson is an Eisner- and Harvey-Award-winning comic book artist and writer, known for his work on Blankets, Habibi, Space Dumplins, Good-bye, Chunky Rice, as well as his current project, Ginseng Roots
Craig Thompson Madman Pin-up
Matt Wagner is an Eisner-Award-winning comic book artist and writer, best known for his creator-owned series Mage and Grendel.
David F. Walker is a comic book writer and filmmaker, best known for his work on Bitter Root, Naomi, Luke Cage, Occupy Avengers, Cyborg, and Planet of the Apes.
Kelly Williams is a comic book artist and writer, best known for his graphic novels The Cabinet and Metaphase.
AND MANY MORE TO COME
Madman Atomic Comics
I Need Your Help!
I appreciate all the support and ask that you help me on this journey by backing this project.
Also, please share this project. Every share helps and is greatly appreciated. 
Instagram: @hanallred 
Twitter: @AllredHan
Facebook: @spacefacemovie
Thank You!
Gabriel Ba, Han Allred, and Fabio Moon.
Rewards
(1) Space Face Prints (2) Space Face T-Shirt (3) Space Face Link (4) Space Face Pin (5) Ultra-Limited Ginchy Blu-ray
 See the Film: Get a link to stream the film and your name in the credits.
See the Film and Get Some Digital Goodies: Get a link to stream the film, get your name in the credits, get a link to download the 1996 indie movie Mike Allred wrote, directed, produced and starred in: Astroesque, and two full length albums from his band: The Gear.
Get the Limited Edition Blu-Ray: Space Face will be available as a limited edition Blu-ray, loaded with hours of extra goodies such as Mike Allred's 1996 indy flick, Astroesque; extra interview content from the shooting of Space Face; and more.
Mike Allred's Astroesque and The Gear
Shirts, Pins, and Prints, Oh My!: Show off your support with a Space Face t-shirt or enamel pin. Also get some limited prints by amazing artist like Allred, Jones, Mahfood, and Oeming.
The All-Out Allred Experience: Stay at one of Mike and Laura's Airbnbs, have dinner at the Allred house, play some pinball, sing karaoke, and get an early viewing of the film with Mike and Han Allred, on Mike Allred's giant HDTV in his studio. 
Original Art from Kevin Smith's Chasing Amy by Mike Allred and Matt Brundage
Art Ops Original Art Grab Bag
3D Space Face Print
Brandon Graham Madman Print
Scott Morse Print
8-Page Yo Gabba Gabba! Story Original Art by Mike Allred
Original Madman Art and Print by Joëlle Jones
Signed Jim Mahfood Madman Print
Michael Avon Oeming Madman Print
Stretch Goals!!
At $40,000 all rewards will have access to Mike Allred's Astroesque with a brand new commentary track. Plus, we'll record a commentary track for Space Face.
Want More?
Listen to Han Allred talk about Space Face on Word Balloon with John Siuntres.
Read Newsarama's Freak Out / Far Out: Explore MIKE ALLRED's 'Existential Episodes' in New Documentary from his Son, HAN ALLRED.
Read First Comics News' Space Face: A Mike Allred Documentary. 

**Because distributors who purchase films sometimes have requirements for how a film is distributed to Kickstarter contributors, the delivery of the reward for viewing Space Face may change at distributor's discretion, but not without good reason.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
NOTHING WILL STOP ME! 

This is truly my passion project. I have already made personal financial sacrifices in order to pursue this project as far as I have, selling many of my beloved synthesizers and shifting my focus from music production to the production of this documentary. (Anyone who knows me, knows what those synths meant to me!)

Time: 
I am determined to make this the best film it can be and—as most of us know—good things take time. I have no intention of rushing out a less-than-stellar film. I have worked on this project for most of 2019, I have shot dozens of interviews, and I hope to have the final edit completed by the end of 2021. As the project moves forward and others become involved, the projected timeline could change, but not without good reason.

$$$: 
Beyond what is set aside to fulfill rewards and pay taxes, every dollar raised here on Kickstarter will be invested into this film. The more I can raise, the more I can spend on production and post-production for a more polished picture.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

support.title: Development Review with Shelly Bond
support.descp:
Professional Editorial Development Review with Shelly Bond.
A veteran comic book editor for over three decades (DC Comics/Vertigo, IDW/Black Crown), Shelly will review your work and provide feedback and pointers to help you get to the next creative level. Shelly has worked with legends including Neil Gaiman, Grant Morrision, Gail Simone, Gerard Way, Michael Allred and many more of comics’ most influential creators. If you’re a writer, Shelly will require a one-page story outline and at least 10 sample script pages (preferably a full issue, 20-24 pages). If you’re an artist, Shelly will require a portfolio sample of at least 10 pages of your sequential work (pencils and inks on separate pages) and 5-6 cover illustrations with sketches included for a full review.
INCLUDES:
Development review with Shelly Bond
Exclusive updates
Your name in the credits
Thank you on the Space Face website

updates.update_content:
Hey all! I’m still hard at work on Spaceface. With Covid a lot of my initial plans have changed (travels and such), but in all, I think for the better. My intention is still to have the film done and all rewards filled by the end of this year. That’s my 2021 goal.
Most shirts and pins have already been sent out to backers. Some prints have made it out too with a lot more shipping out this week. Please private message me here or at hanallred@gmail.com with any questions or concerns you may have about your reward.

Howdy! 
Hope everyone is doing well. I recently moved and now have the studio all set up at my new place, hard at work. I’ve primarily been working on music, b roll, and the edit. I'm digging the progress being made.
I got the Space Face shirts and pins should arrive any day now. I’ll be shipping off the shirts, pins, prints, and art shortly. Please make sure that your address is correct and your Kickstarter survey has been submitted.
Right now, life is great, the film is going well, and I’m excited to be sending out rewards. I am so grateful for all of you. Thanks!!!

updates.update_userinfo: You can tell me all about it on the next Bardo
updates.update_content:
Wow! I am so grateful for every last one of you!! Thanks for sticking it out with me through this chaotic time. Thanks for all the support and enthusiasm. Thanks for believing in me. It all means so much to me.
Golly, did that get suspenseful, but we made it and we made the first stretch goal, too. So, everyone will get access to Astroesque with a newly recorded commentary.
So, what now? For the time being, I’ll stay quarantined, making an extra ginchy movie for all of you.

I just want to acknowledge that times are crazy right now and that I’m so thankful for all your support as we come close to concluding this campaign.
I’m hard at work on the film and nothing will stop me. I’m so proud of what’s been put together so far and can’t wait to share it with the world.
Thank you all so so much! Only 2 days to go!

Just 8 more days!! Thank you all so much for being part of this film! 
Check out this new Madman print by Brandon Graham. Available now, as a reward. If you'd like to add it to your existing reward, you can increase your pledge $50 and send me a message. Thanks!!
Check out the 3D Space Face poster by 3D wizard, Christian Leblanc! I want one and I’m sure you do, too.

updates.update_userinfo: New Reward: Madman Print by Brandon Graham
updates.update_content: I just added an awesome new Madman print by Scott Morse as a reward. Check it out! If you'd like to add one to your existing reward, just adjust your pledge accordingly and shoot me a message. Thanks!!

campaign.story:
(prototype)
Darkness falls upon the world of Urth, the Demon Lord’s shadow spreading chaos, war, and madness. The darker the shadow becomes, the world gets until the Destroyer of all Things finally emerges from the Void to swallow the world and everything in it. Are these the end times as foretold?
Perhaps. Perhaps not.
Across the lands of Rûl, great patrons have come forth to answer the threat posed by the Eternal Shadow by throwing back the darkness and sealing the rifts to the Demon Lord’s realm. The Great Druid rouses the forests fight against demon and cultist alike, while the Queen of Faeries rallies the last of her children to make a final stand loosed by the growing unrest. These and others join forces to find the light they need to safeguard Urth for the rest of time.
Against the Shadow is a cooperative board game designed by Adam Doochin and Dan Heinrich, where the patrons of Rûl must come together to fight against the Demon Lord before this dreadful entity breaks through the cracks in reality and destroys the world. The patrons recruit heroes to undertake quests in the hopes of gaining treasures crucial for driving back the darkness. The Demon Lord, however, has many agents at its beck and call and sends cultists and demons to thwart these heroes’ efforts. It’s a race against time and the patrons must work together if Urth can be saved. Based on the popular horror-fantasy roleplaying game, Shadow of the Demon Lord, the board game gives you an all-new way to fight against the apocalypse. 
Against the Shadow is a cooperative race game for two to five players, with optional rules for one player or six. A typical game takes about an hour to play.
We need your help to make this game a reality. Even though the game has been designed and thoroughly tested, We still need to edit the rulebook and cards, finalize the layout, acquire a few more art assets, and, of course, pay for the printing and assembly. Given the expenses involved in these steps, We're asking for your help to bring this game to tables all over the world.
The best way to help is to choose a pledge level and back the campaign. The level you choose determines the rewards you get in return for your support. Provided the project funds, your dollars go toward covering the expenses incurred as we finishing this game. Now, if the unthinkable happens and the project doesn’t fund, you pay nothing and the project doesn’t happen. I do understand that not everyone can help, but if you believe in this project, I’d appreciate it if you could help spread the word.   
Want to see how the game works? Sure you do! Grab a prototype rule book here. Note, this is not the final rule book.
(prototype)
In Against the Shadow, you become one of the mighty patrons of Rûl, an individual who ranks among the most powerful in the land. You might become the High Jarl of the Jotun or the Faerie Queen. Each patron has special abilities that give you advantages in play.  
(prototype)
To fight the Demon Lord, you need heroes. You recruit heroes from the land, finding dwarfs and clockworks, humans and goblins, and many other characters drawn from the pages of Shadow of the Demon Lord. Heroes, though, are meant to serve and fighting the Shadow means few will survive!
(prototype)
As a patron, you issue commands that direct your heroes and change the circumstances in your favor, either to give you a much-needed edge against the Demon Lord or to snatch victory from the jaws of defeat! 
(prototype)
Adventure awaits the heroes under your control. You send them into deadly situations to wrest treasures from terrifying locations and to find the light the world so desperately needs. Beware, though, for the Demon Lord has many tricks to thwart your efforts!
(prototype)
When your heroes complete quests, slay enemies, and explore the land, they find potent treasures to help you throw back the encroaching darkness.  
(prototype)
The Demon Lord, however, will not give up without a fight. As you play the game, the Dark Lord of the Void places curses on the world, making the game harder to defeat. 
(prototype)
Against the Shadow introduces a number of powerful patrons, each one the great movers and shakers in the lands of Rûl. Patrons of the Demon Lord reveals their stories, histories, motivations, and servants. Packed with new lore, this 32-page PDF supplement is the perfect expansion for creating epic adventure for the Shadow of the Demon Lord roleplaying game.
Stay tuned for details!
We will be charging shipping after the Kickstarter concludes based on the table below. We will collect this via our pledge manager after the campaign ends. This is so we can be fair to all backer because shipping rates vary widely.  
Will ship your rewards at our cost to Black Box hubs. Depending on where in the world you are, we will either ship to you from their hub in the UK, Canada, Australia, or the US.

Unfortunately, different laws and customs from some specific countries have made it impossible for Black Box to ship games to them. If you live in one of the countries below and back the project, let us know and we will research the shipping rate for you from the US and if possible make it happen.

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is my fourth Kickstarter campaign and by now I am thoroughly experienced in how all this works. Since the game is done, there are only a few challenges ahead. Art, editing, and production can all incur delays, but we have built in plenty of time to absorb setbacks. Also, I might die. But if that happens, Dan and Adam, the game's designers will see the project still gets into your hands. Rest assured, your trust is important to me and I will do everything in my power to ensure that I do not violate your trust.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
I want to thank everyone who has pledged and helped to spread the word about the Against the Shadow campaign. Your support and enthusiasm are what makes writing this update so difficult to write. 
While we are approaching the 50% funding mark, we’re sliding into the campaign doldrums, that distressing time between the first 3 days and the last 24 hours. While I was thrilled by the great progress coming out of the gate, we hit the plateau a bit earlier than I expected. I feel that is it unlikely that we’ll cross the finish line by June 1st. So rather than come up short of our funding goal, I have decided to put the campaign on hold for now. 
Putting the campaign on hold doesn’t mean that won’t happen. Rather, it gives me more time to build enthusiasm for the game by making a stronger marketing push leading up to the relaunch. I can also reexamine the product in hopes of finding ways to reduce production costs. Finally, it gives me a chance to see how and if the trade dispute will affect manufacturing costs in China as well as getting a better sense of what will happen to shipping prices from the UK hub if and when Brexit finally happens.

We had a good strong start yesterday and we're pushing on toward the goal. I did want to update you on the revised shipping estimates. We had overestimated the box weight which made shipping internationally really expensive. After plugging in the proper weight, we've been able to drop the prices, which should make it much more manageable for everyone.
Thanks so much for your support! 
Rob

campaign.story:
THE UNDRESS is Kickstarter's #1 most successful women's fashion product of all time, with over $1,386,000 raised in total!
                              Have you ever resorted to changing clothes using a towel or hiding in the car before or after your activities? That’s why we created The Undress so you can CHANGE out of what you’re wearing AND get into a new outfit - and it only takes about 30 seconds.
Security, peace of mind, and convenience in a unique fashionable solution.
      Remove Your Top: First, bring The Undress to your waist. Then use the soft handle to guide the front of the dress underneath anything you want to remove. Bring the straps over your head, and cinch both the neck and back cord locks to secure. Finally, simply remove your top and bra.
Remove Your Bottoms: Insert your hands into the side access openings to easily remove your bottoms. Done!
      Put your bra and top over The Undress, and use the special side openings to put on your bottoms.
Next, simply loosen the cord locks and use the soft handle to guide the straps under all your top layers. Then just slip out of The Undress, and you’ll be in your new outfit!
  The Undress changes to fit YOU. Women’s bodies are very different, but most clothing companies design clothes to fit their idea of ONE ideal shape. So, we sought to challenge the norm and solve a complex problem with a simple, elegant solution - our brand new EVERFIT SYSTEM.
With three adjustment points, The Undress transforms to your own perfect fit!
  The Undress is so size friendly and adjustable, that Size “B”, fits women from Extra Small through Large, Size “C” fits women sizes XL-3XL, and we now have Size "A" for Youth!
UPDATE: Detailed measurement information will be provided in the Backer Survey. You will be able to review all sizing details before placing your order (as well as choosing color(s) and providing all information needed to complete your order). Thank you!
      The Undress changes to match your style - Transform The Undress in 4 ways by using a combination of the cords, cord locks, and belt loops. It’s like 4 dresses in one!
The Undress IS wearable everyday, and we hope it becomes a favorite item in your wardrobe that you wear on a regular basis.
          NEW! Built-in Bra Padding: The Undress Version 3 has a brand-new soft padded lining that provides additional coverage in the chest area of The Undress. The padding is pliable (like swimsuit padding) and gives you perfect coverage. You can now wear The Undress casually, and without a bra if needed.
      Built-in, removable shelf bra (add-on option): If you need support, quickly add an optional, fully adjustable shelf bra strap to provide better coverage and support for those who prefer it!
      Two Hidden Pockets: The Undress has zippered side-access openings with convenient hidden pockets to hold your small items like a cell phone, keys, and more.
      Self Packing: Convert The Undress into a small shoulder bag to take small items with you. You can also pack it away in your gear bag or car so you are prepared for everything!
      Car Seat Cover: Don’t have time to change out of your sweaty clothes after a workout? Don’t get you car seat dirty - use The Undress as an emergency car seat cover instead. It’s built to be as tough as you are.
    The Best Dress for Travel: The Undress is versatile and perfect for any destination. From the beach, the bar, a night on the town, or after a run - you’ll be prepared for anything on your travels. You can even change on a crowded tour bus or plane!
      Love it, or send it back! If it doesn’t fit, you can send it back and exchange for a different size, or get your money-back. No questions asked!
  FABRIC DETAILS:
SOLIDS: Content is being updated. Final content will be posted in the Backer Survey.
PRINTS:
Blue Tribal: 95% Polyester/ 5%Spandex
Blue Chevron: 97% Polyester/ 3% Spandex

Midnight Floral & Burgundy Floral: 83% Polyester/ 17% Spandex
ATHLETIC: 50% Polyester/ 50% Bamboo Charcoal (all colors)
*If you see a color or print you like, please pledge as we may have these colors and prints exclusive to this campaign, and most likely will not be available in the future.
Due to the nature of fabric supply, some dresses may be limited in availability depending on the success of this campaign. The earlier you back this project, the better your selection will be, as we will be allowing earlier/certain backer groups to choose first.  In a rare case if fabric suppliers may not be able to provide the fabric shown, we will find a similar alternative.
**As is the nature of Kickstarter, all products shown are prototypes, and final designs, colors, fabrics, specifications, etc. may change.
PLEASE REFER TO YOUR FUTURE BACKERKIT SURVEY FOR FINAL COLORS & SPECIFICATIONS 
  Introducing The Super Shawl Version 3! The brand new Super Shawl now has sleeves! So, on top of using it like a regular shawl, you can wear it like a cardigan to keep you warm when you're on the go. The Super Shawl is the perfect companion to wear with The Undress!
  You will choose your size and color after the campaign is over via a special email survey sent after June 25.
Dresses shown are prototypes and final color choices are dependent on actual availability of fabrics shown at or near end of campaign.
For limited colors & prints, earlier backers will get first chance to order, so pledge early for the best selection!
Photos of size comparisons are below in our photo gallery! (scroll down)
To pledge to our project, Click the green “Back This Project” button on the campaign page
Next, select the reward you'd like to receive and your pledge amount will automatically populate.
Log into your Kickstarter account.
Pledge with confidence. You payment will not be completed until the campaign ends successfully, so reserve your Undress, now!
                                                                     Hi, we’re April and Dennis and we’ve worked for 3 years to develop what we believe is the most amazing dress system in the world that every active woman would love!
We have come back to Kickstarter because of this community, a community that cares and challenges us to grow and improve our products and ourselves.
When you pledge for The Undress today, you help our little company accomplish new things like develop a wholesale program for the first time so we can sell The Undress in running, yoga, and other specialty stores; pursue worldwide distribution, and redevelop the brand as our next evolution of our transformation.
We have a unique opportunity, and we can’t do this ourselves - we need your help. We invite you to join thousands of our backers worldwide who are courageous, daring, bold, and passionate women from all over the world that represent the Courage to Change. Please pledge, and please share, and we look forward to having you become the first in the world to own The Undress Version 3, and join our founders family.
                                   Co-Founders Dennis Caco & April Estrada

A HUGE THANK YOU to our incredible team and everyone who blessed us with their time, energy, talent and support throughout our entire journey of creating The Undress Version 3. This truly has been the most amazing experience and it would not have been possible without all the people who believed in us and believed in our vision. We send all our love and gratitude to you all and the impact you all have made to us will always hold a special place in our hearts!
Thank you to my parents, Margarita and Jerry, for being our #1 fans and for all your encouragement & support! Also a huge thank you to Denny for being there for me and for letting us borrow your fancy camera! And a thank you to my sister, Stephanie, for your help and for all the funny, random Instagram posts you send me! ;p -April
Thank you to my wife Rachelle, and my son, Drake for bearing with me and supporting me as I work hard to fulfill all of our dreams!  Thank you to my Mom, my family, my friends, and partners for you undying support of all of our crazy projects. - Dennis
        Do you have a guarantee? Yes! Love it, or send it back for a money-back guarantee! No questions asked!
Do you guarantee it will fit? Yes! If it doesn’t fit, you can exchange for a different size, or get your money-back. No questions asked!
Why isn’t the bra strap included in the price? After we surveyed our customers, it was 50/50 in favor of a strap. So we did not want to force someone to buy the strap if they did not feel the need to have it. Also, it is quite laborious to make, so it does cost quite a bit to produce, and we make very little, if anything, on this item.
How did you decide on the length, and why isn’t there a long version? This was debated and we made prototypes of both this current length and a longer version. We had test fitters try both, and the shorter length was the favorite BY FAR. The longer dress was quite cumbersome in comparison. But hey, if you really want a long version, email us and maybe we can be swayed!
When does it ship?  Our target dates for Kickstarter Orders are September-October 2017. These are estimates and are subject to change.
Are the prints really limited to Kickstarter? These prints are chosen specifically for Kickstarter and we plan to sell them out during this campaign. So, if you want any of the prints, you should back them early during the campaign.
What is the fabric content? Information is being updated and all final fabric content will be posted in the Backer Survey. At that time you will be able to review all available fabric options before completing your survey and finalizing your order.
What is the washing/drying instructions? Information is being updated and all final care instructions will be posted inside the Backer Survey. At that time you will be able to review all available fabric options before completing your survey and finalizing your order.
What if I fall between sizes? If you fall between L and XL, we recommend picking Size C and use the Everfit System to adjust The Undress to your desired fit.
International Orders / Shipping - Duties, Tariffs, Taxes are not included in price, and are the backers responsibility.
Limited Fabrics -  Some of the PRINT fabrics are limited based on availability from our suppliers.  We will do the best we can to provide all prints options to everyone, but this may not be possible.  We will try to allow backers from earlier reward levels to select first (backers who ordered $194 or more dresses will also get choice priority.)
This is NOT a perfect system, although we believe it should work well. :)
Hopefully, our fabric suppliers have everything we need and this will not be an issue.
Also, we may continue our campaign into Indiegogo (at an increased price of course), and will reserve the option to have prints available there if they have not sold out in Kickstarter first.  Kickstarter backers get choice priority over Indiegogo backers.  Indiegogo backers may not have the full selection available.
It is vitally important that you fill our your order surveys as soon as you receive them, to help us navigate a potentially difficult ordering process.  We will send order surveys in "waves" starting around July 7-15 (but this is an ESTIMATE.  We will keep in touch via updates).
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Hi! We LOVE Kickstarter and have already had 3 very successful campaigns, The Undress Version 1, The Undress Version 2 SPORT, and The Undercover in which we delivered over 13,000+ units in all three campaigns in 2015 and 2016 and 2017!

Our factory production is already scheduled, and our fabric, trim, hardware are already sourced. We're confident we will be on time for delivery on this project, and the product will be of highest quality! Pledge with confidence!

FABRIC LIMITED - We purposely have chosen fabrics that will be limited in production. If we happen to sell a "bazillion" dresses, we may add more designs and colors to balance the needs of the high volume of orders. Fabric supply is ALWAYS a commodity, and we will do our best to provide all choices to all backers (but know availability is highly dependent on suppliers)

We're veterans at this point, and we are very confident in our ability to fulfill on all pledges since we have be successful three times before!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

LITERALLY –
Give a Fuck, Flying Fuck, Two Fucks...
Flying Fuck Coin - Front & Back
Give a Shit, Two Shits...
Shit Coin - Front & Back
Give Zero Fucks!
Zero Fucks Coin - Front & Back
We're back with some new (and updated) designs for your pissing people off ass', not giving a fuck, pleasure!
We've already got the dies made for our all-new Flying Fuck Coin, Shit Coin, and updated Zero Fucks Coin (with 2017 date). Now we just need your help funding our initial minimum order requirements to mint these masterpieces!
Scroll down to check out the great rewards and awesome stretch goals!
Rewards
  Stretch Goals
FREE Golden Zero Fucks Coin - Front & Back
 $15,000 - UNLOCKED! - The first 400 Backers of our campaign (that pledge for at least 1 coin) receive A FREE Limited Edition 2015 "Golden Zero Fucks*" Coin. Only 420 were ever minted, and they will never be minted again!
$30,000 - UNLOCKED! - All Single Coin Backers receive 1 FREE additional "Golden Fuck**" to their order. All Multiple Coin Backers receive 2 FREE additional "Golden Fucks**" to their order.
$45,000 - UNLOCKED! - Free mystery gift included with every pledge! See update posted on 6/5/17 for slightly more details.
Coin color comparison
 *Golden Zero Fucks Coin - This coin IS NOT GOLD! It is struck from a solid brass slug, and only "gold" in color. Actual coin/metal is brass. These are limited edition from 2015, with only 420 ever made.
*Golden Fuck Coin - This coin IS NOT GOLD! It is struck from a solid brass slug, and only "gold" in color. Actual coin/metal is brass. These have not been minted yet, and will be minted using the the Flying Fuck dies. These will be a Kickstarter Exclusive if the goal is met, and never produced again.
Pledge With Confidence
We make awesome products, and have over 380 5-Star Reviews from past customers to prove it! When you pledge for our coins, you know you'll receive an awesome high-qulaity product.   
Coin Details/Specs
Size:
Each coin is 1.073" in diameter, and .078" thick. They are noticeably larger, thicker, and significantly heavier than a US Quarter.
Material:
Flying Fuck Coin & Zero Fucks Coin - Nickel-Silver
Nickel-Silver is a heavyweight alloy that is a bright silver in color, scratch resistant, non-tarnishing and very durable.
Shit Coin - Proprietary Blend
This coin is another heavyweight alloy comprised of brass, nickel-silver, and other materials that results in a copper in color, which is both scratch resistant and very durable.
"Golden" Fuck & Zero Fucks Coin - Brass
Our limited edition "Golden" stretch goal coins are struck from heavyweight solid brass slugs, which are gold in color and can be polished for a brilliant shine.
Timeline
Punctuality is important to us, and we will we begin production as soon as this campaign ends!
Share Our Project
We could use any help we can get spreading the word about our new coins... So, if you're in a fuck-giving mood, please click on one of these buttons below to tell your friends all about these kick-ass "tokens of appreciation!"

campaign.story:
SO WHAT IS THIS?
Hi! Welcome! My name is Thobias Hoffmén and I’m a Swedish writer and director. I would like to tell you a little bit about a passion project, We R Animals*.
That's me!
Animals*
*creatures, pets, bestial, carnal, erotic, fleshly, lustful, beasts, lunatics, maniacs, psychopaths, savages, brutes.
We R Animals is a film project that I have, on and off, lived with for about eight years now. It all started with the idea of doing short films in the same style as Tom & Jerry or Itchy & Scratchy, but it developed over time and eventually ended up being a complete world with a lot of cool characters and stories. Based on all these ideas I wrote a first draft for a full length feature, which attracted a lot of interest. So in 2010 I ended up selling it to a big production company. However since I kept on wanting to do this as an r-rated film with animatronic puppets it was really hard to convince regular film financiers to invest in the project.
I moved on to work on other projects, but in 2015 I got the rights back and I then took my own money and shot the pitch you can see at the top of this page, and thanks to that one I managed to get a small amount of money to create the conceptual teaser-trailer (which you can see above) and teamed up with Academy Award nominated producer Mathias Fjellström.
And all this leads to this campaign. With it, we're hoping to speed things up.
Still from the teaser
ALL RIGHT! TELL US MORE. WHAT’S THE MOVIE ABOUT? 
Ever since we crawled up from the sea, and down from the trees, the gap between man and animal have become bigger and bigger. While humans have gone to the moon and invented smart phones animals are just hopelessly underdeveloped.
Or, is that really the case? We R Animals tells the story of a different reality. They’re not as stupid as they might seem and they’re definitely not as cute and innocent as they appear to be. Being cute is actually something they’ve learned to benefit from since a lot of the ”cute-animal-video-clips” you see on the web are in fact produced by the animals themselves. Much like the porn industry, this is a nasty business where shady animals earn a lot of money on ads and treats their stars like shit. Welcome to the nasty ”cute animals film industry”!
Flash, a seemingly harmless, sphynx cat is one of these cute animal film producers and he has just found his new star, a bunny named Leah. Leah lives an unhappy life at a circus where she’s never experienced any kind of love. Flash decides to kidnap her but nothing goes according to plan and this creates a chain of reactions filled with revenge, murder and mystery.
Leah ends up in the middle of a conflict between Flash and his partners and a gang of vampire bats on a hunt for an emerald that they think possess magical powers.
We R Animals is a movie that mixes humor with action, crime with fantasy and the movies we grew up loving with the movies of today.
Still from the teaser
OK! SOUNDS INTERESTING. BUT PUPPETS? LIKE THE MUPPETS? 
No, this is not the Muppets. We’ll use puppets, but in another way. Have a look at the teaser and you’ll get an idea of how it will look.
You can also take a look at the behind the scenes film below, and see how they are created. The puppets will get made by my dear friend Niklas Hermansson and his crew at Fixas.
  COOL! SO NO CGI AT ALL?
Well, yeah, we will be using CGI as well. I think that a clever mix is the best way to go and it also will give an unique look and feel to the movie. We’ll use practical effects as much as possible and when it’s necessary, we’ll do touch ups with CGI. But no, I don’t wanna make the characters as CGI-creatures. They’re gonna be puppets.
The end result is what matters, and if that involves some CGI so be it. I’m looking for a unique tone here and I think a mixture of old and new techniques are the way to go.
Like this for example, how we created the throne-room in the teaser. 
We built a foreground-miniature, and then a life-size throne for the puppet. After that we filmed a puppet in front of a green screen and put him in, and made a set extension. Tadaaa, great mix. A good example of a great collaboration between the guys at Fixas and the excellent vfx-people at Goodbye Kansas.
For the cyborg-dog, we made a miniature cyborg and built a miniature set for those shots. For the shots with the dog we built a life-size set and then used a hand puppet. 
Good mix!
SO WHY KICKSTARTER? 
In 2010 a bunch of stills from a test shoot was spread across the web, they went viral and attracted some interest to the project. However back then I didn't even have a script that I was satisfied with yet, and it was also before crowdfunding was a thing, so there were no real way to use that interest for financing the project. 
After that We R Animals has been lying in the background while I have done lots of other stuff. I wanted more experience in directing, and I wanted to find the right techniques to make the film as good as I know it can get, but also as cheap as possible. 
So in recent years I have worked with a lot of different things. Web-series, TV-series and features. A lot of it praised and award-winning here in Sweden. 
I'm ready for We R Animals now. I have over the years gotten me a fine network of people who’ll now be involved in this film. People you can read more about later in this text under ”crew”. 
So yeah, we want to KICKSTART this movie, with the help of kickstarter and you guys. Basically to speed things up and to be able to work on it not only in our spare time.
GOALS 
Ok, so I have a real grand vision for this project, but making this film into the glorious feature that I’ve envisioned will most definitely cost a lot more than I’ll be able to finance through a crowdfunding campaign. 
However, there’s a lot of stories to be told with the characters in the ”We R Animals”-universe. So as a first goal for this campaign I’m aiming to make shorter films. I'd rather make good short films instead of trying to make a longer film with a lot of compromises.
But, of course, I still have the ultimate goal set on making this into a feature.  It might be a long journey, but please join me on this quest and I'll make sure it’ll be worth it!
Basically, the more money we can get, the closer to the feature we’ll get. Every dollar (!), everything raised in this campaign will be used in my quest for making the feature. Either through shorts that will convince people to invest in the feature, or by making the feature right away! That’s the best way to do it.
REWARDS
!!!Keep in mind!!! All pledges are based on Swedish currency! The amounts in dollars below are estimates. When you choose your pledge on the right you will always see the current value. The exchange is about 1 USD = appr. 8.50 - 9 Swedish crowns.  !!!
In the list below you can see a summary of all the rewards. As a lover of collectibles and stuff myself, I’ve made sure to offer things that I would love to own as well. 
Almost all of the rewards below will be produced exclusively for this campaign! So get on board now!
UPDATE REGARDING DVD/BLU-RAY
You can now get the film on regular DVD or Blu-ray.
So if you already have chosen the digital download, but rather want it on DVD/Blu-ray, you can now manage your pledge and upgrade!
But what does this mean for the Super-exclusive-kickstarter-limited-DVD/bluray?? Well, it's still as limited and exclusive as before. Only 250 of them will get made. But we will now also throw in the poster in that pledge! And have a different cover as well. And yeah, it will be signed and numbered, which the regular one won't be.

UPDATE REGARDING "PUTTING YOUR NAME IN THE CREDITS"
You can now put your name in the credits for approx $50 USD (440 SEK)! All the pledges above this tier will also have their name in the credits!
NEW REWARDS!
A thank you card! Signed by me. And yes, all of you who've already chosen a pledge above the 215 SEK-tier will get this one as well.
And we also have this wonderful option. 
ADD-ONS!
Build your own package of rewards with add-ons!
You can add a reward to your pledge level by simply choosing an amount to add and answer a survey at the end of the campaign to let us know what item you want.
ADD-ONS INSTRUCTIONS: To add an add-on to your pledge, follow those steps:
1) Press the “Manage Your Pledge” button above. If you have not pledged yet, it will say “Back this Project”.
2) Increase your pledge in the “Pledge Amount” box by the total of the add-on you want to add.
3) After the end of the Kickstarter campaign you will receive a survey that will ask you questions so that you can explain how you would like the add-on money assigned.
CREW
Writer & director: Thobias Hoffmén
The man behind We R Animals is Thobias Hoffmén who’s also written the script and will direct the film. He has, among other things, created popular series for SVT (Swedish Television) like the award winning Hoppas Farfar Dör (We Wish Our Grandpa Dies), and the critically acclaimed Insiativet (Almost Heroes).  
He is currently working as a writer/director at BOB Film AB in Stockholm.
Producer: Mathias Fjällström
Mathias Fjellström is a producer/director with experience from working with commercials for big brands like Adidas and Coca Cola and he has also a excellent track record as a producer of short films by internationally acclaimed directors like Patrik Eklund and Amanda Kernell. His short films has participated- as well as won prices at big prestigious festivals like Sundance and Cannes and in 2010 he was nominated for an Academy Award for Patrik Eklund’s Instead of Abracadabra.
SFX & Puppets: FIXAS 
Niklas Hermansson and Fia Reisek are the founders and owners of FIXAS, together they have more than 20 years of experience in special effects and prop making.
They have previously worked on projects like The 100 Year-Old Man Who Climbed Out the Window and Disappeared, Let the Right One In and many more!
Lead Puppeteer: Robert Tygner
Creating the puppets is one thing, but bringing them to life on set is another! It’s so important to have a brilliant puppeteer and here we have one of the best! Robert has worked on films like Labyrinth (!), Where the wild things are, Hitchhikers guide to the galaxy, little shop of horrors, The muppets, and come on, he was the one who puppeteered Splinter in the Turtles film!
VFX: Goodbye Kansas Entertainment Group
The Goodbye Kansas Entertainment Group consists of Fido, Bläck, Imagination Studios and Infinite Entertainment, with studios in Stockholm, London and Hamburg. They provide VFX, CGI, motion capture and animation for film, TV, commercials, advertising, computer games development and marketing.
They have previously worked on projects like The Walking Dead and Kung Fury. And many more!
CREDITS FOR THE KICKSTARTER PITCH FILM
Written & directed by Thobias Hoffmén
SFX & Puppets: Niklas Hermansson, Pernilla Fischer, Fia Reisek, Fixas
VFX & Grade: Daniel Bladini, Goodmotion

Special thanks to: Christoffer Sandler
CREDITS FOR THE PROOF OF CONCEPT TEASER
Dog: Schiaffino Musarra, Vampire King: John La Briola, Vampire Bat: Alan Adler, Cyborg-Pug Lindsay: Eleni Young
Writer/director: Thobias Hoffman

Editor: Nils Moström
VFX: Goodbye Kansas, Tom Olsson: Executive Producer, Hanna Bengtsson: Producer, James Prossner: Line Producer, Tomas Näslund: VFX Supervisor, Henrik Klein: compositing & conform, Fredrik Höglin: compositing, Aleksandra Czenczek: compositing, Natalie Macdonald: compositing, Teo Mathlein: DMP, Emeric Saint-Germain: DMP

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Of course there will be risks with investing in this, like it always is when making movies. But here’s what we do to minimize those:

First of all we are professional film makers and have no illusion of the effort needed to make this happen. The film will be executive produced by David Sandberg, the man behind the world wide crowdfunding hit sensation “Kung Fury”. David will both work with the project creatively, but will also share his experiences on how to handle a crowdfunded project. 

The budget is quite dynamic. We’re aiming for making the film with advanced animatronic puppets and high quality equipment as well as well crafted set design, but the film can of course also be made cheaper by using less advanced equipment, shot a lot of stuff on location and, most important, using less advanced puppets. This might give some limitations to the style and tone of the film, but it won’t change the characters and the story and those are the most important things, This also means that the more money we get the cooler looking movie we’ll get. 

The biggest risk in the project is that it might be hard to make a proper time plan at this point. However this is what we’re aiming for: 

If the first goal is reached: The short film will be finished in 2018. 

If the first stretch goal is reached: The prequel will premiere in 2018. 

If the second stretch goal is reached (The full feature): This is the hardest one to predict, but we’re aiming for a premiere in late 2018. 

Our plan is also of course to be as transparent on how everything is coming along. This will be communicated via the behind-the-scenes-film that is a part of the rewards and via updates on social media outputs.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Pixelmash: Easily create pixel art from photos, simple sketches, or from scratch. 
Pixelmash is our Mac/PC software for creating pixel art from photos, simple sketches, or from scratch. Its tools have been specially designed to make the process of making pixel art much quicker and more intuitive than with traditional software.
Convert photos directly into iconic pixel art.
You can easily import a photo of anything, erase unwanted background elements, divide it into layers, then adjust the resolution and pixel art effects until you get exactly the look you want. You’ll be surprised at how quickly you can turn a mundane object into bright, iconic video game art.
Also great for starting from a simple sketch.
Many of the same tools that make converting photos into pixel art so easy also work great for painting over sketches using our brush tool, then applying the same handy resolution adjustments and layer effects.
Anyone can use Pixelmash.
You don't have to be a pixel art pro to make something awesome with Pixelmash - our unique resolution-independent approach and intuitive layer effects make it possible for anyone to use.
It's already functional, but we need your help.
You don't have to worry about whether or not we can make what we're talking about - Pixelmash already exists as a fully-functional alpha that we’ve been using internally for our indie game projects. However, we need your help to give us the resources to add finishing touches, as well as your suggestions, to turn it into a fully-releasable product!
Start using the alpha right away and help guide development. As soon as the project is funded and the crowdfunding campaign completes, you’ll get access to start using the fully-functional alpha build right away (assuming you’ve donated at a level that includes that reward, which is every level but the very lowest). You’ll also get access to give us feedback and suggestions to help guide the development of Pixelmash!
Stretch goal: vector drawing tools ($100K). As a stretch goal, if we reach over $100,000 in funding we’ll also add vector drawing tools to Pixelmash, allowing for a true resolution-independent pixel art workflow!
We look forward to hearing your feedback.
We’re excited to bring you Pixelmash, but we’re especially excited for the features and ideas that we haven’t even thought of yet, that we’ll learn from you as you start using the alpha build and give us suggestions and feedback!

updates.update_userinfo: Pixelmash 2020 is here, with major new features!
updates.update_content:
We're very excited to announce the release of Pixelmash 2020!

This new version features several significant new features we think you’ll love! Pixelmash now includes support for reference layers, saving and loading layer effects, color profiles, tiled painting, and more. There’s also a powerful new gradient layer effect, and even support for saving and loading files as reusable templates. Check the videos below for more!

Pixelmash 2020 trailer: youtu.be/mi2hsA5wzMc
New Features Walkthrough: youtu.be/CrxlwM_lAzY

This is a paid upgrade for all users who purchased a version of Pixelmash more than 1 year ago. If you need to upgrade your license (or want to check if you need to), you can do so at . If you purchased Pixelmash from nevercenter.com in the last year, your upgrade to the new version is free; simply download the new version from and use your same registration information. Pixelmash 2020 is also available on and via the .

:

We've also created a brand new website with tons of feature videos both new and old, check them out and read more at ! Here is a quick overview of some new things in this Pixelmash 2020 update:


This is a major new feature which lets you easily re-use your work across projects, similar to Brushes in tools like Photoshop. If you've set up a complex (or simple) set of Layer Effects to achieve a certain style, you can now export that as its own file and easily import it into future projects. Just use [File > Export Layer Effects...] to export the effects on the current layer. If you want to export the entire layer structure with effects, use [File > Save as Template]


Pixelmash already had one gradient type, Auto Gradient. The new effect is just called Gradient, and it's a simple tool which allows you to choose the angle, colors, and number of steps, and is applied to everything in that layer.


You can now mark any layer as a reference layer. It will display with adjustable opacity, and will not be affected by layer effects or affect anything else in the scene. This is perfect for importing reference images, temporarily marking a previous animation layer as reference, and more.


Color profiles can be an annoying headache when working with images. We've added simple tools for keeping your color profiles straight [Edit > Color Management]. By default, you're all set just leaving this as it is, but if you need more control you can switch to Adobe RGB, no color management, convert on export, and more.


You can now toggle whether a parent's layer effects will affect the children or not. Both are very useful for different circumstances.


If you are viewing your work in tiled view, you can now work anywhere in the space, not just the original image bounds.


The previous version of Pixelmash was 1.2.5, and the new version is 2020.0. Further versions will reflect the new scheme. This change emphasizes the live nature of Pixelmash's development, as we focus on faster, smaller, more frequent updates in response to the community's needs. We've also updated the licensing system, so that instead of us releasing a new paid upgrade each year, each license simply comes with a year of free upgrades. This is not a subscription; your latest valid version will always continue to work even if you haven't purchased future upgrades. It simply ensures that everyone gets a full year of upgrades regardless of when they purchase.

Hope you like it! Thank you for your support and for being part of this creative community!

Best,
Nevercenter

Hi Everyone, we've released an update to Pixelmash (grab it here) that adds a lot of the features people have been requesting since it's release! Included are:
• Added Pencil tool for drawing lines at width of current pixelized resolution 
• Added Fill tool
• Updated shortcuts to match other drawing apps better, and added keyboard shortcuts for brush resizing
• Improved painting speed
• Added ability to paint straight line segments using right-click within brush/pencil tools
• Added menu item to create new layer at the pixelized resolution (rather than full high project resolution)
• Added menu item to bake layer resolution/effects (rather than entire project resolution/effects)
• Hid the registration serial from startup screen (useful for anyone streaming pixelmash sessions)
• Much more to come, stay tuned!

campaign.story:
What NUFF is All About
NUFF Skateboards was built from a simple desire to push the limits of board technology, all while keeping one foot firmly planted in the traditional roots of skateboard culture. Skateboarding started out in California in the 50s, came into its own in the 70s, and now in the present, NUFF is taking it to the next level.
  Our Boards
At the heart of what NUFF does is craft solid, dependable skateboards designed to do what skateboards do: help you get around town. NUFF boards are incredibly powerful with a 2000W motor, surprisingly affordable, and extremely fun to ride!
                We’ve pioneered some of the latest technology in super-light, high-powered electric motors in order to make our boards top-of-the line, while also remaining more affordable than our competition. 
*Update as of March 2nd! New Wheel Options!*
The team here at NUFF has endlessly been working to constantly have new and exciting upgrades to the boards. With this being said, we are proud to announce the brand new wheel options that all backers will have when they support our campaign! Check out a few samples below! 
       You now will have the option to choose what color board you would like to receive, which will dictate that wheel color as well! 
Our First Unboxing! 
To really give you an idea of what you will be receiving when you back this campaign, we sent a brand new board to one of our consumers in the market and had him unbox it! Hear what Shahrukh had to say about what you will be getting in the box!
    Beginner or Expert? We Have Modes That Are Perfect for You
Our NUFF boards are beginner friendly as well as tuned perfectly for those who are experts and seeking that extra thrill. 
Beginner Mode : This is a mode for first time users and those who want to get a feel for how our boards ride! Cruise at a top speed of 15mph
Superior Mode : Finished with Beginner mode or are you an expert at riding skateboards? This mode is perfect for you! Our superior mode will give you higher acceleration while hitting a top speed of 24mph!
  How You Control Your Adventure
   Each one of our NUFF Boards comes paired with an intuitive and ergonomic controller. Easily control the speed of your board with the speed knob, as well as being able to keep an eye on the battery life of your board!
The Power Source 
Our NUFF Boards are equipped with a state of the art removable battery system. It is waterproof and dust-proof, so you can ride in almost any condition!  Each wheel is equipped with 1000 Watts of power as well, giving you that extra power you have never experienced before! Run out of juice from your adventure? No problem! Just detach the battery, give it a quick charge and you will be back on your adventure in no time!
Know Exactly What You Are Riding
  Our Promise, NUFF Said
We firmly believe that being well-off should not be a prerequisite for owning a NUFF board. Skateboards were designed to be a fun, fast, and simple mode of transportation. That’s why we have done everything possible to set our costs at a level that will not keep our boards out of the hands of people who love to skate. NUFF boards are not designed to be a Christmas present you use for fun and set it in the corner. These boards were designed to be a way to get from point A to point B—only faster.
    Gear Up!
Customize your NUFF board with our exclusive NUFF stickers!
Cannot escape the feeling of always being on our NUFF boards? We got you covered! With each NUFF board purchase, receive a mini fingerboard to cruise around on with your fingers!
Lastly, we want our NUFF riders to be comfortable while they ride. This being said, all boards will also include a ultralight and comfortable tee to cruise around in!
Shipping Details
We want you to have the NUFF board as soon as we can get it to you! Shipping will take place in early June, and as a token of our appreciation, shipping within the United States is completely free and on us! However, for those supporters outside of the States, a $75 dollar shipping fee will be added.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Have Fun Riding, While Being Safe

Our NUFF Boards are fun to be on, but it is also an electric skateboard. For first time users, it will be different riding feeling, so it is advised that you try the board in the "low mode" and in an open area before tackling the higher speed and more crowded areas. Nuff also believes in safety when riding our boards, so always wear a helmet and any personal protective gear in case anything happens. Do not ride the board out of your skills and care about your environment.

Legality

Laws and regulations regarding electric vehicles and electric skateboards vary by country, state, county, and municipality, so before hopping onto one our NUFF boards, be sure to check out your local laws about electric skateboards!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Bears vs Babies is a card game where you build handsome, incredible monsters who go to war with horrible, awful babies. 
It was created by the same people who made Exploding Kittens: Elan Lee (Xbox, ARGs) and Matthew Inman (The Oatmeal). The game takes a few minutes to learn, it's kid-friendly, and each round takes about 20 minutes to play.
(Stretch Goals here!)
    THE ORIGIN STORY
                                   I’ve always wanted to make a card game. A few years ago, I started working on a game based on my comic, The Oatmeal, where you connect heads, torsos, arms, and legs to create a variety of monsters based on characters from my comic, such as the Bear-O-Dactyl. The original version of this game was doodled onto paper cutouts, and had no functioning game mechanic other than “build funny-looking things.” 
The very first version of the Oatmeal card game.
Two years ago I met Elan Lee, and he showed me a prototype of a game called “BombSquad,” which we renamed to Exploding Kittens. After Exploding Kittens launched, my creature-building game got put on hold.
After the dust from Exploding Kittens eventually settled, I asked Elan to help with the design of my monster-building game. I didn’t want this to be one of those games where you're trying to "out-comedy" one another; I wanted it to be more of a deck-building game, such as Dominion or Hearthstone, but without all the complexity. I wanted a monster-building game you could easily play at a party.
 Up until this point, my version of the game had a big problem:  when you played, you were on autopilot. You had no decisions to make and usually one correct action to perform on every turn.  Elan has been designing physical and digital games for most of his career (he invented the genre of alternate reality games, and was formerly the creative director of the Xbox), so he put his gargantuan puzzle-solving brain to work and added a layer of much-needed complexity to the game.  He tinkered a bunch and established the basic rules of conflict, construction, and the escalation mechanic that would define the core gameplay. The tricky part was keeping this simple enough to be a party game, but complicated enough to allow for depth and strategy. It’s easy to fall into two bad categories when designing tabletop games: either they’re easy to learn but completely random, or they’re very strategic but mind-numbingly boring. You have to walk a very thin line between the two. I think with Bears vs Babies we did that.
Our battle-hardened "Sharpie Deck"
After months of pestering everyone we knew to play the game with us and tweaking the rules bit by bit, we finally got it to the point where our friends pestered us to play, instead of vice versa. And that eventually brought us here, to Kickstarter, where we’re now pestering the whole internet to play with us.
And so here we are. 
Let the bear hugs and baby burping begin.
-Matt and Elan
----------
   ----------
                                                                                 Press Inquiries
Email: info@bearsvsbabies.com
----------
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Remember that one time two years ago when we built Exploding Kittens and shipped everything we promised to you ON TIME?

Seems like a pretty keen idea to try that again. We're going to use the same great folks at Ad Magic to print the game, and the same incredible team at Blackbox to get it over to you once it's printed.

The biggest risk is really just getting cocky. We know this won't be easy, and we know how hard we're going to have to work to get you your game in the timeframe we promised it.

Just like last time, we're going to keep things basic. We're not going to offer t-shirts, or posters, or anything else that will get in the way of us delivering the game to you as promised. We're keeping it as simple as possible: support our project and in return we'll send you the playable game.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Out in a sunny park for a picnic...
 Take your GreenTraveler to the mountains, the sea, or anywhere you want food to be. 
#GreenTraveler on a hike ...
 Take it on any adventure or bring leftovers away from a restaurant without disposing of another container.
... Or to the office
 Literally anywhere.... such freedom!
Take yours everywhere....
Get your FINAL DAY SPECIAL today!! Less than 48 hours left to grab the best discount available anywhere. Two (2) GreenTravelers for only $70! Or one of two Bundle Packages! See below for details.
Bundle Package
Featured Pledge
 Why?
We created the GreenTraveler to offer a solution to people who leave the house and want a convenient, travel-friendly way to take food on-the-go without messes like these:
Ditch the unreliable, leaky and wasteful containers and carry your GreenTraveler everyday, everywhere!
How often  do you wish you had your favorite food with you to avoid going hungry or spending money on over-priced restaurant food?
While trying to use other portable containers, we were tired of leaks, spills, having only one compartment leaving our food soggy, inconvenient shapes and sizes that don't fit in a bag, and throwing away disposable to-go containers that didn't work very well anyway.
Thinking back, you may have memories of battling some problems that standard food containers pose...
With GreenTraveler everywhere as your primary container you may be amazed how many uses it has - keep liquids in, keep rain and water out, store food and beverages, use for first aid or baby supplies, or for any items you need protected.
What?
For us at GreenTraveler, the world's most convenient, waste-free, portable container is a cylinder with carabiner loops and 6 compartments that won't leak, spill or break. It was modeled from a water bottle, which we carry everywhere to avoid disposable plastic bottles... the same problem.
Check out the Features
For this size and shape plastic is still the best material. But don't be afraid of it. We made sure it has no BPA or phthalates so it won't leach chemicals in your food, even in a microwave. Chances are you are already eating out of plastic with food you buy at the grocery store or your containers at home. The plastic used in the Original GreenTraveler is approved by the food safety foundations for food around the world.
GreenTraveler Specs
 To see these features in motion, see our rendered animation in this short video:
 Who Cares?
Do you leave your house sometimes? Do you eat? Do you want to save money? Then this is for you. It is not only for adventure travel or active lifestyles, although adventurers will love it. It is for the commuter who goes to a job all day. The student who goes to school. Hobbyist photographers or fishermen. The GreenTraveler is for people who leave the house and want good food wherever they are. 
Who can use the GreenTraveler? Adventurers, Commuters, Families, Students, and Travelers.
The world has taken notice.....
Thanks to all media sources! More are covering this campaign than we can possibly include. These were some of the first to publish.
How does it work?
The Original GreenTraveler may feel like a puzzle the first time, but once you get the hang of it, you'll wonder why it didn't exist before.
... Assembly is easy, too!
Just put some food in it and off you go :)
How Much?
The Original GreenTraveler replaces many items you may use every day.
GreenTraveler is worth the price!
Until Nov 22nd, the Original GreenTraveler is being sold on a Kickstarter discount from retail price to reward those early adopters that support us in making this project a reality! See the rewards available to the right.
We are thinking that if you love the GreenTraveler, you will also love some of our rewards ... 
 At the top are our T-shirt rewards:  
Custom designed insulated carrying pouch Add-On by Bluewave. Measures 14"x4" with an added pocket for utensil plus what is shown above. $23 includes shipping worldwide.
End caps to hold two center body compartments tightly together to make a smaller liquid-tight GreenTraveler without the need for cups. $8 includes shipping worldwide
Spread the Word!
Help share this campaign with the links at the top on your favorite social site. Or get paid for it with KickBooster!
Or with Funded Today's Cashback Program:
Thank you!
We couldn't have done this without our awesome media firms helping us get the word out!
 Get Your Project Funded Today!
 Kickstarter Video Production by StartMotionMedia.com
Big Thanks to Michael Zeligs of Start Motion Media for our fantastic video!
What if?
We have a consultant living next to the manufacturing facility who is nearly like a partner, conducting continuous 3rd party quality control. But what if your GT breaks or you don't like it?
Warranty:
Manufacturer's defects are covered for a month. Just send picture or video of the defect to us and we will get a replacement part sent to you.
GreenTraveler covers its products under normal use for life. We want you to enjoy our products your whole life and never see them in a landfill. We also offer a recycling program to provide a replacement part with free shipping if you ship the broken part to us (or send a photo of it in the proper recycle bin). See our website for warranty details.
What's Next?
We hope you'll enjoying using your new adventure toy. Take it everywhere and see how useful it can be.
Connect with us on social media and stay tuned as we have new innovations coming to you!
 We have planned for a couple years in the future with logistics, partnerships, financial proformas, and designs of new products we will launch. All we need is the successful launch of this first product with initial funding for injection molding and we can give you much more convenience while traveling.
Then and Now
This project just kept calling us to be born! This is our first Kickstarter, but not our first business. As serial entrepreneurs with finance experience, we put all our intelligence, time, and money starting in November 2015 to make it a reality with full force.
Here is how far we've come with this project:
GreenTraveler Evolution
THANK YOU from the GreenTraveler Team!  
James Robinson, Juliene Sinclair and Josey Zadoria
We made it to Times Square!
Great animation of our logo by our partner Josey

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Coming from investment banking and business development backgrounds we know what makes a business successful and what makes them fail. We are aware of the growth stages and are planning for them to eventually grow to become a mature, multinational enterprise. 

Our product has shown proof of functionality and a need in the market place, even to some that weren't already aware of their need.

We have pre-planned everything we can think of with redundancy, including: legal advice, product labels, boxes, secondary assembly logistics, customs brokers, and fulfillment centers. We do not expect any hiccups, but the first hurdle will be manufacturing high-quality products to perform as designed. We are happy with the prototypes the manufacturer made so we expect the die creation to go smoothly as well.

Chinese New Year may set back our timeline a couple months if we don't get the quality we want before then.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hello everyone,

It seemed to work out very well to recieve your emails calling me a jerk. Thank you for making that smooth. 😉 I think we have this campaign mostly complete.  Finally.

I want to also inform you that we are having a clearance sale starting today, in honor of Cyber Monday, and going on until Christmas. We will be selling out of nearly all inventory over the next month to save on storage costs and will not manufacture more products until Corona times have passed and people are traveling again. Which, I’m starting to be afraid may not be soon. Sadly...

Hello everyone,
First of all, as today is Thanksgiving in the US, I want to say again thank you to all of you, and send my gratitude for helping to breath life into this project! It has barely survived but is not dead.
I have hung on long enough to attract an investing company that is now rebranding GreenTraveler as BeOn Container. Be on your way! The website is live but still under construction. New colors have been created and are on the ocean, en route to the US warehouse.
